title: Scorpius By Zenith E-Juice
description: Try breakfast all day with this nostalgia-packed, homestyle blend of crunchy cereal, cinnamon, brown sugar, and a touch of milk. On the inhale you’ll immediately notice the familiar and all-too-good taste of cinnamon and brown sugar, but the exhale is smooth with a velvety milk finish. Freshly steeped in sugar and oats, you’ll be amazed by our milk’s silky consistency.
